text: Abakkiriza abasajja n’abakkiriza abakazi, abamu mikwano gya bannaabwe, balagira okuyisa obulungi, ne baziyiza okuyisa obubi, era ne bayimirizaawo e sswala ne batoola zzaka, era ne bagondera Katonda n’omubakawe, abo Katonda ajja kubasaasira. Anti mazima ddala Katonda nantakubwa ku mukono, mugoba nsonga
